_sText:
***************Armory & Sniper Battle**********************

VERSION 1.1: I fixed the big glitch where I had a few holes in the ground

- This map I made features two bunkers, one with T and one with CT.

- Each bunker is stocked full of scouts to snipe over to the other side with.

- However, there is a door in each spawn with a keypad, which only YOU as the downloader will get the key code to :)  (It is possible for others to figure out the code but they will probably get sniped in the process)

- Once through the door, there is a room with all of the weapons in the game in it.

- After that, you can choose to go left into the teleporter and spawn out in the middle of the battlefield and run over and throw grenades into the enemy spawn.

....OR...

- Turn right and run down the hallway and go through the door into the enemy spawn and blast them to bits!


So basically, the enemy will be caught COMPLETELY off guard by your assault and all they will have are their scouts :).

Have fun with it!

By |SS|Rogue Guy, come visit my server at 8.3.5.43:27015
